answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
Here's an agreement the City of Charlottesville has with the University of Virginia to provide fire related services.  Hope this helps.

answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Janice – I hope the following is helpful:
Hemet – Council approves contracting out for fire services 
http://blog.pe.com/city-government/2013/11/13/hemet-council-expected-to-vote-on-fire-contract/ 
Malta, NY – fire protection services agreement 
http://www.malta-town.org/ArchiveCenter/ViewFile/Item/257 
Municipal Resource Services Center, WA - Interlocal Cooperation in Fire Services
http://www.mrsc.org/subjects/pubsafe/fire/ig-fire.aspx
Santa Ana, county sign contract for fire 
http://www.ocregister.com/articles/city-343148-santa-fire.html
Madison County, Miss. - Contract for Fire Protection Services 
http://madison-co.com/images/agenda_files/12/Valley%20View%20Contract%20for%20fire%20protection%20(2).pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Corporate Partner Liaison
Alliance for Innovation

author: Janice McClintock
text: We are looking for effective models for contract or shared fire services. Is there a model that works well for you? If so please share the model.
title: Shared or Contract Fire Services
